column2: As your health gets lower your performance increases
column10: 随着你的生命值变少，你的表现会提高

column2: You gain an aura of magical transmutation that affects 3 random materials
column10: 你获得一个嬗变的魔法场域，能够作用于3个随机材料

column2: Holy mountains will have a guaranteed extra perk, but at a cost...
column10: 圣山中必定会出现一个额外天赋，但需要付出代价...

column2: Your projectiles cause larger, more destructive explosions.
column10: 你的投射物会造成更大、更具破坏力的爆炸。

column2: You may come and go as you please from the Holy Mountain.
Killing enemies rapidly builds a killstreak which awards more gold.
column10: 快速击杀敌人可积累连杀次数，从而奖励额外金钱。

column2: Receive significantly less damage, but damage is permanent.
column10: 受到的伤害大幅减少，但受到的伤害是永久的。

column2: You heal for half the amount gained when gaining maximum health.
column10: 最大生命值增加一定量时，当前生命值增加其一半的量。

column2: You become immune to enemy damage for a short time after taking enemy damage.
column10: 受到来自敌人的伤害时，短暂时间内免疫来自敌人的伤害。

column2: You purify the earth around you
You deal significantly more damage, but the ground tremors at your might
column10: 大幅提升你造成的伤害，但大地因你的威力而震颤

column2: You experience no recoil as long as you are grounded.
column10: 只要你双脚不离地，就不会受到后坐力。

column2: Spells you cast will cost two thirds as much mana.
column10: 你施放的法术只会消耗原本三分之二的法力。

column2: Your flasks can now hold twice as much.
column10: 你的烧瓶现在能装下两倍的物料。

column2: You cast all of your wand's spells at once.
column10: 你会一次性施放法杖里的所有法术。

column2: Your max health is tripled, but you're unable to gain more health from hearts
column10: 将最大生命值变为原本的三倍，但心无法再增加你的最大生命值。

column2: You convert nearby Polymorphine to Acid, and gain immunity to being polymorphed.
column10: 你会将附近的变形魔药变为酸液，并且免疫变形效果。

column2: Your damage increases the closer you are to death.
column10: 你离死亡越近，造成的伤害就越高。

column2: The next stackable perk you take will be taken three times, but your max health is reduced.
column10: 下一个可堆叠的天赋将被拾取三次，但降低你的最大生命值。

column2: The next stackable perk you take will be taken three times, but your max health is reduced. This perk has been consumed.
column10: 下一个可堆叠的天赋将被拾取三次，但降低你的最大生命值。此天赋已被消耗。

column2: You slowly heal while out of combat, but your flesh is weak.
column10: 你在战斗之外会缓慢自愈，但你的肉体变得脆弱。

column2: You are more resistant to damage from status ailments.
column10: 你受到异常状态的伤害减少。

column2: Taking damage makes you enter a state of rage briefly.
You have a chance not to use spell charges
column10: 你有几率不消耗法术的使用次数。

column2: Summon a box which may hold treasures within
column10: 召唤一个可能内含宝藏的箱子

column2: Summon a box of medical supplies you can take with you
column10: 召唤一包医疗补给品，可以将其带在身上

column2: Confuse your enemies by swapping places with your attacker.
column10: 与攻击者交换位置，迷惑你的敌人。

column2: You become immune to lava and burns, bleed lava, and become hydrophobic!
column10: 你免疫岩浆和烧伤，受伤时流出岩浆，同时变得恐水！
你的法杖融合到了一起。

column2: From now on wands you find will have slightly better stats.
column10: 从现在起，你找到的法杖会有稍微更好的属性。

column2: All that was lost returns to you.
column10: 遗失的一切都重归于你。

column2: The weight of the scales are relieved, but your options are running out.
column10: 天平的重量减轻了，但你的选择正在耗尽。

column2: Reroll your defences, and gain a random secret immunity!
column10: 重置你的防御，并获得一个隐藏的免疫！

column2: Gamble on your life! You have a chance to revive upon death, but can take critical hits.
column10: 赌上你的性命！你在死亡时有概率复活，但可能受到暴击。

column2: Every spell in your inventory is consumed, but you get an equal amount of random spells back!
column10: 消耗物品栏中所有的法术，但你获得等量的随机法术！

column2: Each spell in your inventory is rolled down..?
column10: 将物品栏中所有的法术替换成上一个...?

column2: The longer you spend in the air, the less damage you take.
column10: 你处于空中的时间越久，收到的伤害越少。

column2: Your critical hits deal an additional 2x damage. Gain up to 100% crit chance over 4 seconds, consumed on firing.
column10: 你的暴击造成双倍伤害。4秒内获得至多100%暴击率，施法时消耗。

column2: This perk is missing its localization data!
column10: 此天赋缺失本地化信息！
